BlackBerry launching its 'Classic' phone in December

BlackBerry launching its 'Classic' phone in December — If there wasn’t a market for BlackBerrys, the company would have died or been sold by now. I’m not sure whether it’s niche markets or legacy businesses that are keeping them in business, but something has to be.
